name: NixplayFrame
0:
”Alexa, ask my frame to show me my playlist.”
”Alexa, open my frame.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my frame
des: This skill allows you to ask Alexa to display your Nixplay playlists on your Nixplay Cloud frame. This skill requires a Nixplay account and a compatible frame in order to work.
